15 HumanAgent::HumanAgent() {
16  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
17  initialize();
18 }

20 HumanAgent::~HumanAgent() {

23 
24 void HumanAgent::initialize(){
25  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
26 
27  //here set the parameter of conveyor belt to "init" so it automatically starts
28 
29  /*
30  * Initializing ros services
31  */
32  callObs_inform_action = nh.serviceClient<hrc_ros::InformHumanAction>("/observation_agent/inform_human_action");
33  callObs_inform_newState = nh.serviceClient<hrc_ros::InformHumanState>("/observation_agent/inform_new_human_state");
34  callTaskMang_inform = nh.serviceClient<hrc_ros::InformHumanToTaskMang>("/task_manager/human_status_update");
36  stayIdle = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/stay_idle");
37  walkAway = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/walk_away");
38  lookAround = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/look_around");
39  warnRobot = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/warn_robot");
40  attemptGrasp = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/attempt_grasp");
41  grasp = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/grasp");
42 
43  reset_scenario = nh.advertiseService("/human_agent/reset", &HumanAgent::resetScenario, this);
44 
45 
46  // loop at 2Hz until the node is shut down
47  // ros::Rate rate(0.2); // No need for this when running a thread as a service
48 
49  ROS_INFO("Human Agent is created !");
50  update();
51 }
52 
53 bool HumanAgent::resetScenario(hrc_ros::ResetHumanROSRequest &req,
54  hrc_ros::ResetHumanROSResponse &res) {
55  human_action_taken = "";
56  human_belief_state = "";
57  human_real_state = "";
58  initial_state_received = true;
59  ROS_INFO("HUMAN ROS: Reset!");
60 
61  res.success = true;
62  return true;
63 }
64 
65 
66 void HumanAgent::update() {
67 
68  ros::NodeHandle n;
69  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
70  srand (time(NULL));
71 
72  auto& echo=server.endpoint["^/?$"];
74  server.config.port = port;
75 
76 
77  echo.on_open=[](shared_ptr<WsServer::Connection> connection) {
78  //cout << "Server: Opened connection " << (size_t)connection.get() << endl;
79  };
80 
81  echo.on_message=[&](shared_ptr<WsServer::Connection> connection, shared_ptr<WsServer::Message> message) {
82 
83  ros::spinOnce(); // TODO: intended to catch the reset service call
84 
85  string message_receive=message->string();
86 
87  cout << "Human ROS Server: Message received: \"" << message_receive << "\"" << endl;
88 
89  string message_send = "None";
90  auto send_stream=make_shared<WsServer::SendStream>();
91  *send_stream << message_send;
92  server.send(connection, send_stream, [](const SimpleWeb::error_code& ec){
93  if(ec) {
94  cout << "Server: Error sending message. " <<
95  "Error: " << ec << ", error message: " << ec.message() << endl;
96  }
97  });
98  //cout << "Server: Sending message \"" << message_send << "\" to MDP"<< endl;
99 
100  // interprete action and state
101  std::size_t index = message_receive.find(",");
102  string human_action = message_receive.substr(0, index);
103  string human_state = message_receive.substr(index+1);
104 
105 
106  /* call action service*/
107  // EVERY MESSAGE IS EITHER A HUMAN ACTION BELIEF UPDATE OR A HUMAN REAL STATE UPDATE
108  // HUMAN ACTION UPDATE RECEIVED. INFORMING ABOUT BOTH ACTION AND THE STATE (either initial or belief state)
109  if (human_action != "-1"){
110 
111  std_srvs::Trigger::Request req;
112  std_srvs::Trigger::Response resp;
113 
114  action_taken_time = ros::Time::now();
115 
116  // TODO: For the expert case fix the probabilities below
117  bool success = true; // TODO: this is not used!
118  if (human_action == "0") { // grasp or grasp attempt
119  if (task_number_counter > 30){
120  if (rand() % 10 < 7){ // fixed to 80% chance of failure
121  attemptGrasp.call(req, resp);
122  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human attemping grasping...");
123  } else {
124  grasp.call(req, resp);
125  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human grasping...");
126  }
127  } else if (task_number_counter > 20 && task_number_counter <= 30){
128  if (rand() % 20 < 12){ // fixed to 60% chance of failure
129  attemptGrasp.call(req, resp);
130  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human attemping grasping...");
131  } else {
132  grasp.call(req, resp);
133  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human grasping...");
134  }
135  } else if (rand() % 40 < task_number_counter) { // gradually decrease the amount of successful grasp as the task number increases
136  attemptGrasp.call(req, resp);
137  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human attemping grasping...");
138  } else {
139  grasp.call(req, resp);
140  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human grasping...");
141  }
142 
143  // change the name of the action to its originals so that task manager recognizes
144  human_action = "grasp";
145  }
146  else if (human_action == "1") { // look around
147  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human looking around...");
148  lookAround.call(req, resp);
149  human_action = "looking around";
150  }
151  else if (human_action == "2") { // idle
152  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human staying idle...");
153  stayIdle.call(req, resp);
154  human_action = "idle";
155  }
156  else if (human_action == "3") { // walk away
157  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human walking away...");
158  walkAway.call(req, resp);
159  human_action = "walking away";
160  }
161  else if (human_action == "4") { // warn robot
162  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human warning robot...");
163  warnRobot.call(req, resp);
164  human_action = "warn the robot";
165  }
166  else {
167  success = true;
168  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is human ERROR !!!");
169  }
170  ROS_INFO("HUMAN ROS: human in belief state: %s and took action: %s", human_state.c_str(), human_action.c_str());
171 
172  /* THIS IS TO LET HRC_OBS KNOW THAT HUMAN ACTED!*/
173  hrc_ros::InformHumanAction::Request req_action;
174  hrc_ros::InformHumanAction::Response res_action;
175 
176  req_action.human_action = human_action;
177  callObs_inform_action.call(req_action, res_action); // response is a boolean about the status of the service call
178 
179  // Below the global variables are assigned ! These are for sending the status later to the task manager
180  human_action_taken = human_action;
181  human_belief_state = human_state;
182  action_info_received = true; // raise the action received flag
183  newstate_info_received = false;
184 
185  }
186  // HUMAN STATE UPDATE RECEIVED. INFORMING ABOUT THE NEW HUMAN STATE RECEIVED.
187  // THIS IS FOLLOWED BY THE ACTION SELECTION THEREFORE THIS NEW STATE IS THE REAL STATE OF THE NEXT STEP
188  else{
189  ROS_INFO("HUMAN ROS: Real state informed after the action is: %s", human_state.c_str());
190  hrc_ros::InformHumanState::Request req_state;
191  hrc_ros::InformHumanState::Response res_state;
192  req_state.new_human_state = human_state; //
193  callObs_inform_newState.call(req_state, res_state); // response is a boolean about the status of the service call
194 
195  // global variables are assigned ! These are for sending the status later to the task manager
196  human_real_state = human_state;
197 
198  newstate_info_received = true;
199  }
200 
201  // TODO: currently it is sent every time human action info is received. So, send one in every two calls
202  // First real state is received, then the action and the belief on this state. After both are received then inform task mang.
203  if (action_info_received){
204  // ############ SENDING HUMAN UPDATE TO TASK MANAGER ############
205  action_info_received = false;
206 
207  hrc_ros::InformHumanToTaskMang::Request reqForUpdate;
208  hrc_ros::InformHumanToTaskMang::Response resForUpdate;
209 
210  hrc_ros::HumanUpdateMsg update_msg;
211 
212  update_msg.stamp_human_update = ros::Time::now();
213  update_msg.action_taken_time = action_taken_time;
214  update_msg.human_belief_state = human_belief_state; // belief state
215  update_msg.human_action_taken = human_action_taken; // took action in the belief state
216 
217  if (initial_state_received){
218  update_msg.human_real_state = human_belief_state; // in initial state human mdp sends the init state directly
219  initial_state_received = false;
220  }else{
221  update_msg.human_real_state = human_real_state; // new state
222  }
223 
224  reqForUpdate.human_update = update_msg;
225 
226  callTaskMang_inform.call(reqForUpdate, resForUpdate);
227  task_number_counter = resForUpdate.task_number;
228  }
229 
230  };
231 
232  server.start();
233 
234 }
